data.title: Lets
data.meta_description: Oppdag engasjerende og morsomme aktiviteter med vÃ¥r fysisk teambuilding! Vi tilbyr unike team building-opplevelser som styrker samholdet og fremmer positiv teamutvikling. Utforsk vÃ¥re teambuilding-aktiviteter nÃ¥!
data.text:
About the game

Explore remarkable landmarks in an entertaining manner. We blend gamification with sightseeing to offer a unique and engaging experience! Teams will traverse 23 locations at Oscarsborg and tackle diverse tasks. Equipped with a map and a tablet as their trusty tools, teams won't have time to visit every spot, so a strategic plan is essential. Given the variety of tasks, each team member can make a valuable contribution. Typically, the winning team excels in effective teamwork, creativity, and a strong desire to win!

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->

The Map

Together with the tablet, each group will receive a physical map featuring the game's 23 checkpoints. These checkpoints offer varying point values based on their geographical distance. At each location, you'll encounter diverse missions that can earn you additional points. Crafting a strategy is a wise move: Do you aim to tackle the checkpoints with the longest distance and the highest point rewards, or do you prioritize visiting more checkpoints that are closer by but offer fewer points? As you move between checkpoints in the game, you'll also receive additional tasks on the tablet to help boost your score!

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->

The content of the game

The game contains a wide range of different tasks. Teams compete in a creative point hunt and sightseeing activity where they visit the locations on the map. The locations selected are specifically interesting for the area you are in. You won't have time to visit all the locations, so you need to create a strategy. The game includes quiz, brain teasers, riddles, poems, sound clips, video tasks, and photo tasks.

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->

Practical information

Let's Play provides an activity complete with all instructions and equipment for the group. The game can be carried out independently or with the assistance of our activity leaders. Groups of 4-6 people play the game using a tablet. The playing time can vary and be adapted to your needs, but is usually between 60-90 minutes. The game generates many fun photos and a results list, which is presented when the activity is finished.

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->

Customized to your needs

We can customize the content of the activity to better suit your company's profile and your event. We will customize the game with desired questions from your company and add your graphic profile and logo. We will guide you through how the questions can be formulated, and we ensure that they will work within the framework of the activity.

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->

The goal of the activity

The objective of the activity is to offer a creative and enjoyable team-building experience that nurtures collaboration and team spirit. This challenge sparks heightened engagement and competitiveness, prompting logical thinking, effective communication, and innovation. Additionally, participants have the opportunity to familiarize themselves with the surrounding area as an added bonus.

Klikk for Ã¥ se ->
